content: It appears that default implementations of associated constants are not currently permitted with the min_specialization feature (rustc complains "specialization is unstable")â€”but having read through @Aaron Turon's July 2017 blog post "Shipping specialization: a story of soundness", @Matthew Jasper's PR Implement a feature for a sound specialization subset earlier this year that introduced min_specialization and the wider discussion in @nikomatsakis's Tracking issue for specialization (RFC 1210), I get the impression that they shouldn't give rise to any soundness issues. Is that correct, or is there some hidden issue with associated constants that I'm not immediately seeing?
